entries.content: In ineffective calls, the call ends when the prospect says no, without uncovering the reason.
entries.notes: Criticism of poor handling of disinterest

entries.content: A proper prospecting call must first uncover if the prospect has problems or symptoms that your solution can fix.
entries.notes: Proactive diagnosis of fit/need before asking for next step

entries.content: Uncover whether the prospect has any intention of fixing the identified problem or has tried to fix it previously.
Determine if fixing the problem is something the prospect is currently considering looking at doing.
entries.notes: Diagnosis of current status or potential timing

entries.content: Only ask if they would invite you in to explore further *after* uncovering problems, intention, and consideration.
entries.notes: Structure the call to qualify first, preventing premature 'not interested'

focus_area: Handling "Not Interested": Probe softly, diagnose if disinterest or timing
